parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the auto idle/stop feature can cause the vehicle to stall or shut down unexpectedly, leading to safety risks, especially when stopping at intersections or in heavy traffic.
symptoms: The engine shuts off when idle-stop is engaged
but fails to start back up when the brake is released
leaving the vehicle stranded.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the infotainment system can cause distractions while driving, leading to safety risks.
symptoms: The screen goes black
there is no backup camera available
the audio system makes popping or crackling noises
and the system may shut down completely.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the electrical system can cause various safety risks, including the failure of critical systems, such as the brakes or engine.
symptoms: The vehicle's electrical system malfunctions
causing the engine to shut down
the brakes to lock up
or other systems to fail.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the auto start/stop feature can cause the vehicle to stall or not restart, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The engine turns off at a stop
but does not restart when the brake is released
the transmission goes into neutral
the dashboard displays a message to put the vehicle in park to start the engine
the vehicle stalls or hesitates to start.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden explosion of the sunroof can cause distraction, injury, and damage to the vehicle.
symptoms: The sunroof glass shatters or explodes without warning
causing a loud noise and potentially injuring occupants.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Loose or faulty mirrors can cause distraction, reduce visibility, and increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The driver-side mirror is loose
vibrates
or detaches from the housing
causing reduced visibility and distraction.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the infotainment system can cause distraction, reduce safety, and increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The infotainment panel goes dark
displays a "Network Connection Lost" message
or produces a crackling noise
causing distraction and reducing safety.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the automatic emergency braking system can cause accidents or increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The system randomly applies the brakes
displays a "BRAKE" message
and slows down the vehicle without warning
causing unexpected stops and potential accidents.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the forward collision mitigation system can cause the vehicle to brake suddenly and unexpectedly, leading to accidents, loss of control, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle brakes suddenly without any obstruction or vehicle in front
the brake warning light flashes
the steering wheel shakes
and the vehicle slows down or comes to a sudden stop.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the VSA modulator can cause the vehicle's safety features to malfunction, leading to accidents, loss of control, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The dash displays a warning message
the vehicle's safety features are inoperable
and the dealer may instruct the owner to replace the forward camera/radar sensor.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Unintended braking can cause accidents, loss of control, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle brakes suddenly without any obstruction or vehicle in front
the brake warning light flashes
and the vehicle slows down or comes to a sudden stop.
